titleStmt.title: The last counsel of a martyred King to his son. Wherein is contained, 1. The last precepts of the most Christian King of Charles the First, written by his own hand to his son Charles the Second King of Great Brittain France and Ireland, &c. ... 6. A divine eligie upon the great sufferings and death of his sacred Majesty. Never publisht before. By J.D. Esq; a loyal subject and servant to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Gregory, Francis, 1625?-1707.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Jones and are to be sold at the Royall Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Contains: A letter written by Charles I. to his son, dated 26 Nov. 1648; together with a account of the death of Charles I., and an elegy. -- Thomason Catalog.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
